RelatedSentence: GILLETTE - A 31 - year - old Gillette man accused of fatally shooting a yearling cow for its meat and then damaging a backhoe after disposing of the remains is facing additional charges of aggravated burglary and disposal of stolen property .

GILLETTE - A 31 - year - old Gillette man accused of fatally shooting a yearling cow for its meat and then damaging a backhoe after disposing of the remains is facing additional charges of aggravated burglary and disposal of stolen property .

A1: Epley had already been sentenced to
RelatedSentence: The Gillette News Record reported that Justin Epley had already been sentenced to six years in prison for being a felon in possession of a firearm when the cow was killed .
Prosecutors now say the guns thought to have been used in the killing , an AR - 15 rifle and a .45 - caliber handgun , were stolen .
Authorities say Epley put the backhoe into drive and sent it into a ditch after killing the cow .
